name: The Block
title: Data Insights Trump Tokens Skyrockets Crypto Apps
text:
Synopsis
The launch of Trump's $TRUMP memecoin on Solana has catalyzed significant growth in crypto app usage, blockchain activity, and market attention, potentially signaling a new wave of crypto adoption and ecosystem development.

Key Insights
- $TRUMP memecoin reached $75 billion valuation in under 36 hours, with nearly $4 billion traded in its main liquidity pool
- Solana's total value locked (TVL) increased to $9.77 billion, a 600% growth from a year ago
- Crypto-related app store rankings saw dramatic increases:
  - Phantom wallet jumped from 357th to 35th overall
  - Coinbase rose from 209th to 32nd overall
- Solana's decentralized exchange (DEX) volume reached $122 billion, compared to Ethereum's $45 billion
- Tweet volumes for "Bitcoin" and "Ethereum" increased by 100% and 297% respectively
- Real-world asset (RWA) protocols' total value locked reached $7.3 billion, a 200% increase from a year ago
- Potential policy developments suggest increased crypto legitimization under a new administration
